/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. In the distance, majestic mountains rise against the horizon, their peaks shrouded in mist. The road itself is divided by a concrete barrier, ensuring the safety of the drivers. A few cars can be seen on the road, going about their journey. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, driving down the highway towards the mountains. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the highway. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in Beijing, capturing the city's blend of urban development and natural beauty.
